component.name: JClicker
component.summary: XDG Desktop Portal based autoclicker for Linux written in java

description.p: Linux native autoclicker that was written because I wanted to play cookie clicker but the only other autoclicker I found did not have global shortcuts.
Features: Global shotrcuts. Configurable delay (Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Milliseconds, Nanoseconds). Can click every button on the mouse including back and forwards.
Missing features Clicking keyboard keys. Theming only dark theme so far because swing is going to give me an aneurysm.
